content.html:
Warm Up Activity

Evaluate mentally.

  1. \( 25 \)% of \( 200 \)
  2. \( 12 \)% of \( 200 \) 
  3. \( 8 \)% of \( 200 \)
  4. \( p \)% of \( 200 \)

Think about how you came to your answers. To check if you are correct, select the Solutions button here.

Here are the correct answers:

  1. \( 50 \)
  2. \( 24 \)
  3. \( 16 \)
  4. \( \frac{p}{100} \ \cdot200 \), or \( 2p \)

You learn more from wrong answers than from right answers! Wrong answers help us find flaws in our thinking. Take a minute to think about why you got the question wrong. Then you won’t get this type of question wrong again!
